# grid2img

```
I = grid2img(G::GMTgrid{<:Unsigned})
```

Converts a GMTgrid of type Unsigned into a GMTimage. Data array is not copied nor its type is changed.

```{julia}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
using GMT
GMT.doc_source_links("grid2img")
```
